nodes.text: Childar was a lieutenant who served the Republic Army aboard the space station Carrick Station, selling combat gear during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Childar first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Quesh planetary commendation vendor on board Carrick Station. He was later removed from the game.
